price: 43. Diggah yalli ginó taynuwweeh qiddam (rabissam) Neé kaadu madaara Nee fan takke iyye.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
